entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • What should I do to build aspnet offline? #56776
  • Static Readonly Field Value Gets Replaced #56775
  • Exception in browser when navigating to Blazor page running in InteractiveWebAssembly render mode #56774
  • .NET 8 Blazor @attribute [Authorize(Roles = "Admin")] not working #56773
  • [Blazor] Provide a mechanism to pass IConfiguration variables from Server to WASM #56772
  • Expose method for testing for a local URL consumable without depending on MVC #56770
  • Allow Response Caching for Authorized Endpoints #56769

Closed

  • JsonSerializerIsReflectionDisabled exception in Blazor despite using Source Generator. #56752
  • Invalid project created when name has `&` (ampersand) or ` ` (space) in it #56765
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #56750
  • Support options for setting callback used to generated reference IDs in OpenAPI #56305
    9.0-preview7

PullRequests

Created

  • Allow Response Caching for Authorized Endpoints #56768
    community-contribution, area-middleware
  • Set additionalProperties when [JsonExtensionData] is present #56767
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal

Merged

  • Add support for CreateSchemaReferenceId option #56753
    area-web-frameworks, 9.0-preview7

Updated

  • Add `AuthorizationPolicyBuilder.RequireClaim` overload that take a `Predicate<Claim>` #56346
    community-contribution, area-security
  • Add OpenAPI operation and schema transformer interfaces #56395
    community-contribution, feature-openapi, area-web-frameworks
